title: Jungle spider

properties.name: description
properties.value: Jungle spiders are monsters that can be found on Karamja and the archipelago east of Yanille. They are not displayed on the minimap so they can be a threat to low level players who don't notice them. Jungle spiders appear in the Tai Bwo Wannai Cleanup minigame.

This article is about the common variant. For the Ape Atoll variant, see Jungle spider (Ape Atoll).
 This article has a Slayer task guide here.
Information comparing locations for Slayer tasks will be on this page

Jungle spiders are monsters that can be found on Karamja and the archipelago east of Yanille. They are not displayed on the minimap so they can be a threat to low level players who don't notice them. Jungle spiders appear in the Tai Bwo Wannai Cleanup minigame.

Unlike other jungle monsters and their Ape Atoll counterpart, they are not poisonous.
